helpers¶

Important functions to store/load files in a compressed format.

helpers.load_arrays(folder_name, file_name)[source]¶

Given a folder name and file name, we will load the array

Param

folder_name (str) - the name of the folder

Param

file_name (str) - name of the file

Returns

matrix (np.ndarray) - array

helpers.load_pkl_file(folder_name, file_name)[source]¶

Given a folder name and a file name, we will load the Python class. For example, a full GP module

Param

folder_name (str) - the name of the folder

Param

file_name (str) - name of the file

Returns

module (Python class) : complete module or it can be EMCEE full module

helpers.store_arrays(array, folder_name, file_name)[source]¶

Given an array, folder name and file name, we will store the array in a compressed format.

Param

array (np.ndarray) - array which we want to store

Param

folder_name (str) - the name of the folder

Param

file_name (str) - name of the file

helpers.store_pkl_file(module, folder_name, file_name)[source]¶

Given a trained GP (module), we will save it given a folder name and a file name

Param

module (python class) - for example, the GP module

Param

folder_name (str) - the name of the folder

Param

file_name (str) - name of the file
